At the initial position, you are asked to navigate according to a series of movement instructions. In terms of next steps, what is the best next step for you?  
choose:  
A. I fly forward, then turn right.  
B. I go up and turn left.  
C. I fly forward while rising.  
D. I turn right and descend.  
E. I rotate the camera downward.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The initial instruction is to "take off and turn little right and move forward till the pond arrives." Since the agent is at the initial position on the ground, the best next step is to fly forward while rising to gain altitude, which aligns with the take-off part of the instruction. This prepares the agent to then make the slight right turn and proceed towards the pond as directed.
